rules_text:
[i]Bride of Life – [/i]When Lucina, Bride of Life enters, you become the monarch.[i]
Inheritor of Ylisse – [/i]You don't lose unspent mana as steps and phases end.[i]
Lovely Future – [/i]{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Each player may draw a card. If a player does not, they may put a land card from their hand onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only once each turn.
